data.name: Jake and Tess' Finding Monsters Adventure
data.app_name: Jake and Tess' Finding Monsters Adventure
data.description:
"Finding Monsters is a stunning game with adorable monsters and an original premise and play style.” (VRGiant)
 
“Jake and Tess’ Finding Monsters Adventure is one of the best looking Gear VR titles VRFocus has yet witnessed.” (VRFocus)

Finding Monsters Adventure has some awesome news for you: Now the game costs only $4.99 and we support 8 new languages: Chinese (Simplified), Korean, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Spanish. Not enough? You asked and we heard: you can also take pictures with your gamepad thanks to our partial controller support enabled in this new version.

Finding Monsters Adventure on Gear VR is a fantastic photo challenge that continues the magical universe of Jake & Tess as they dare each other to take pictures of the funny, cute & mischievous monsters in this immersive experience.

Get your Gear VR ready as this unique family experience that takes monster hunting to the next level.
